review.title: “Confused Company”
review.pros: Pros – They do great work on the treatment side, people are generally nice (especially the receptionist)
review.cons: Cons – Their marketing strategies are a bit ingrained and archaic and people, they are generally slow and yet demanding. Constant internet/phone/printer/fax problems & other key business areas are lacking
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Faster adaptation, better policies, and more availability.
